languages.text: [Напасть] "Мне наскучил этот фарс. Правом, данным мне священным Патентом, я объявляю этот суд завершенным, а вас — виновными. К бою!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"
languages.original_text: [Напасть] "Мне наскучил этот фарс. Правом, данным мне священным Патентом, я объявляю этот суд завершенным, а вас — виновными. К бою!"

traits.locale_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. To battle!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. To battle!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. To battle!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"
[Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

languages.text: [Angreifen] "Diese Farce langweilt mich. Gemäß der mir durch den heiligen Handelsbrief verliehenen Rechte erkläre ich diese Verhandlung für beendet und Euch beide für schuldig. Attacke!
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [Angreifen] "Diese Farce langweilt mich. Gemäß der mir durch den heiligen Handelsbrief verliehenen Rechte erkläre ich diese Verhandlung für beendet und Euch beide für schuldig. Attacke!
[Angreifen] "Diese Farce langweilt mich. Gemäß der mir durch den heiligen Handelsbrief verliehenen Rechte erkläre ich diese Verhandlung für beendet und Euch beide für schuldig. Auf in den Kampf!"

languages.text: [Attaquer] « Cette mascarade commence à bien faire. Par l'autorité que me confère la lettre de marque sacrée, je déclare ce procès achevé et vous condamne l'un et l'autre. À l'attaque ! »
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer] « Cette mascarade commence à bien faire. Par l'autorité que me confère la lettre de marque sacrée, je déclare ce procès achevé et vous condamne l'un et l'autre. À l'attaque ! »
[Attaquer] « Cette mascarade commence à bien faire. Par l'autorité que me confère la lettre de marque sacrée, je déclare ce procès achevé et vous condamne l'un et l'autre. Aux armes ! »

languages.text: [攻击]“我已经厌倦了这场闹剧。根据神圣授状赋予我的权力，我在此宣布审判结束，你们两个人罪无可赦。准备开战！”
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [攻击]“我已经厌倦了这场闹剧。根据神圣授状赋予我的权力，我在此宣布审判结束，你们两个人罪无可赦。准备开战！”
[攻击]“我已经厌倦了这场闹剧。根据神圣授状赋予我的权力，我在此宣布审判结束，你们两个人罪无可赦。开战吧！”

languages.text: [Atacar] «Me he cansado de esta farsa. Por el poder que me otorga la sagrada Patente, declaro este juicio concluido y a vosotros, culpables. ¡Al ataque!».
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [Atacar] «Me he cansado de esta farsa. Por el poder que me otorga la sagrada Patente, declaro este juicio concluido y a vosotros, culpables. ¡Al ataque!».
[Atacar] «Me he cansado de esta farsa. Por el poder que me otorga la sagrada Patente, declaro este juicio concluido y a vosotros, culpables. ¡A la batalla!».

languages.text: [攻撃する]「この茶番にはもううんざりだ。聖なる令状によって与えられた権限に基づき、この裁判はここに終結、君たち二人を有罪とする。戦闘開始！」
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [攻撃する]「この茶番にはもううんざりだ。聖なる令状によって与えられた権限に基づき、この裁判はここに終結、君たち二人を有罪とする。戦闘開始！」
[攻撃する]「この茶番にはもううんざりだ。聖なる令状によって与えられた権限に基づき、この裁判はここに終結、君たち二人を有罪とする。戦闘開始！」

languages.text: [Saldır] "Sizin saçmalıklarınızla mı uğraşacağım? Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak bu duruşmayı bitiriyor ve ikinizi de suçlu buluyorum. Saldırın!"
languages.original_text: [Attack] "I am bored of this farce. By the right granted to me by the sacred Warrant, I declare this trial concluded and you both guilty. Attack!"

traits.locale_text: [Saldır] "Sizin saçmalıklarınızla mı uğraşacağım? Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak bu duruşmayı bitiriyor ve ikinizi de suçlu buluyorum. Saldırın!"
[Saldır] "Sizin saçmalıklarınızla mı uğraşacağım? Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin bana verdiği yetkiye dayanarak bu duruşmayı bitiriyor ve ikinizi de suçlu buluyorum. Savaşa!"
